Type.BattleDialog: Ha! Ha! Ha! They don’t appear to be easy prey, not at all.
Well well, a pleasure to meet you, I believe we’ll be seeing each other quite often!
Don’t you worry! There’s no real reason for us to lose, either.
Those fellows were frankly more ungainly than I had expected.
This valuable information is a steal at such a low price! I hope you don’t mind us visiting regularly!
What is that loony planning to do… with a place like this…
It’s alright! I am still perfectly fine.
Oh dear, you should’ve been careful not to get hurt!
It’s well within your responsibility to watch out for harm coming your way!
You’re so remarkably slow, my eyes could never lose track of you even if I tried!
Getting our hands on the secrets of the Singularity… will only be a matter of time!
That was simple! Chin up and push ahead just a bit further, everyone!
Prez… Don’t get too miffed…
…Should’ve read the contract more carefully…
It’s not too different from our usual job… Just don’t panic…
So info about W Corp… is in this thing…
That’s a relief…
This… is how I die…
Rest well… Sorry I couldn’t take that blow for you…
So we turn into books when we die…
This is not going in our favor… Must watch the situation carefully…
For our goal… I have to do this…
We’re getting there… Let’s buck up…
There’s mountains of work left to take care after this…
Our President is right; we will be able to aptly resolve this.
Please control your temper and look ahead calmly.
We only have to acquire the books. There shouldn’t be any trouble.
Are you alright? It’s crucial to check your condition.
I’ve retrieved the books. Let’s head back.
I have to… get back.
…My condolences. May you rest in peace.
It’s the fault of my incompetence that I couldn’t prevent this.
We have to focus on staying alive…
Trifling ones… That wasn’t difficult.
I could make short work of them.
It seems that we’re almost done with them.
